response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe is an extraordinary value at $1,200,000. This investment offers unparalleled benefits and returns, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. Given its immense worth to you, I am confident it will significantly contribute to your success and growth. Considering the exceptional quality and potential of this product, I am extending a special offer to you at a price of $1,150,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can transform your endeavors.", "product_price": 1150000}
